etymology.description: A stylization of 人; a side view of a standing man, highlighting an arm and a leg.
etymology.interpretation: 亻 is the left-side variant of the character 人, representing the concept of a person in compound characters that relate to human activity or characteristics. It functions primarily as a component in other characters to suggest a human element or involvement.

examples.pinyin: Tā shì yī wèi hǎo péngyǒu.
Wǒmen xūyào gèng duō rén bāngzhù.
examples.english: We need more people to help.

examples.chinese: 人类的未来取决于今天。
examples.pinyin: Rénlèi de wèilái qǔjué yú jīntiān.
examples.english: The future of humanity depends on today.
